title: Admire Item
description: Enables the mob to admire items that have been configured as admirable. Must be used in combination with the admire_item component.

admire_item_sound.title: Admire Item Sound
admire_item_sound.description: The sound event to play when admiring the item.

on_admire_item_start.title: On Admire Item Start
on_admire_item_start.description: The event to run when admiring the item.

on_admire_item_stop.title: On Admire Item Stop
on_admire_item_stop.description: The event to run when no longer admiring the item.

sound_interval.title: Sound Interval
sound_interval.description: The range of time in seconds to randomly wait before playing the sound again.
